file_content.text: Come--before reinforcements arrive.
Taking the shot. I love this thing!
No, no, no. Don't do this!
Everything all right?
Tired already, old man?
Something's wrong with the omnicannon--it won't fire!
I'm not old!
You had one job!
Stop complaining and help me.
Better give him a hand.
Fine.
Take over, short stuff.
T7 = ready to help! // Gravestone = in good interface arms
What the--?
Gravestone = in danger! // Koth + T7 = must help!
Don't worry. The old girl's safe on my watch!
No one is safe. The Gravestone least of all.
Getting pretty tired of you digging around where you don't belong.
You speak as though your opinion matters. You are weak. Inferior. Nothing.
You mind? I'm trying to concentrate.
You cannot stop me.
And stay out!
Outlander! So nice to see you. I love what you've done with the hangar.
I had a lot to work with.
Inspired, isn't it?
Vaylin, there's no need for bloodshed. Tell me where Arcann is.
You're not my target.
Your voice makes my ears bleed.
Shut up.
Prickly. Your mood rivals my brother's.
Brother will be pleased you're in a good mood.
Brother would be cross if we fought.
He's been down lately. Put a smile on his face, will you? You'll find him on the bridge.
You're not going to interfere?
Of course not! I don't care about you. I'm here for Mother.
Go on. I'll keep her busy so she can't meddle with our plans, then meet up with you later.
And if I get to Arcann before you do?
Stop him. For his sake and mine.
Tsk-tsk. Patience isn't a virtue.
We'll do it your way, Vaylin.
I thought so. Run along, Outlander.
Whatever Vaylin has done, whatever she's become, she's still your daughter.
Vaylin is still your daughter.
If you don't kill her, I will.
Kill her, or I will.
You don't have to do this alone.
We can fight together.
I can handle this.
This is my battle. Yours is with Arcann.
I know.
I can't tell what's happening from here.
Looks like I got here just in time.
Koth = came back! // T7 = missed you
You don't think I'd just sit by and let Arcann win, do you?
Go. We'll cover you.
